modName: Oblivion Gates in Skyrim - a Modders Resource
descriptionHtml:
[b]Oblivion Gates in Skyrim[/b] - Modders Resource by Hanaisse

v2.0 - 11/14/12
- Added proper collision to all models
- Added 5 new textures
- Improved all textures from 1024x1024 to 2048x2048

[b][color=#ff9933]Proudly displayed in Open Cities Skyrim.[/color][/b]


Meshes and textures only, 100% made by me, by request. Use as you will, I only ask you give me credit.

Includes;

- 6 gate models: Full, Full but broken, 3/4 full, Half, 1/4, and a stub.
- 4 rock clusters: To fill around the base.
- 1 spike.

Ten hi-res textures to choose from for the gates and rocks - mix or match. Two textures for the spike.


[i]** Don\'t forget to repath the textures in Nifskope first **[/i]

Enjoy!

This is a modders resource, free for use, no permission necessary.
Please give credit where credit is due if using.
Do not upload this specific file of meshes or textures anywhere else.
author: Hanaisse
